name: shape and color
description:
SHAPE AND COLOR:
Is a relaxing speed run, where you have no time limits.

A simple game where you have to put the shapes in their containers but be careful not to get confused by the colors.

COMMANDS:

if you are playing from a smartphone you can use TOUCH and SWIPE, if you are on pc use the DIRECTIONAL ARROWS KEY.

For a better experience on pc put in fullscreen mode
